name: A Light to The Past
description:
WASD/Arrow Keys to Move   (Controller: D-Pad, L-Stick)

E/Space/Mouse1 to Interact/Use   (Controller: A/R1/R2)

*Note: If you're experiencing minor audio issues playing the game in browser I would suggest playing it in a different browser (Top reccomendation: Firefox) or downloading the windows version of the game.

**Double Note: If you're worried this is a horror game, don't worry, it's not. This game does not feature jumpscares or monsters of any kind.

It's a late winter eveninig and you find yourself dropped off at a house, a stranger's house. You've never seen it before, and as you turn back to the car to ask, they've already driven off. You're left with no choice but to knock on the door of this unknown house... No one seems to be home though, all the lights are off...

A few minutes pass, and no one has come to answer the door... Suddenly, you feel something in your front pocket, a key. You don't remember having a key... But, might as well try it on the front door, what else are you supposed to do besides standing around?

The key fits. And the door opens...

SharSharShar - Music, Musical SFX

Cab - Coding, Modelling, Not-So-Musical SFX

opendyslexic.org - Font

Created for the GeoJam 2021, with the theme SWITCH. All assets and code was created during the week by us, the only thing we didn't create was the font. Thank you for reading!
